```{r}
s0 <- readLines("data/5507-syllabus.txt")
i <- 0
n <- length(s0) %/% 3
subheads <- str_detect(s0, "^  ")
mainheads <- (nchar(s0)>0) & !subheads
s0[mainheads] <- paste0("<h4>", s0[mainheads], "</h4>")
s1 <- paste0(s0[mainheads | subheads], collapse="\n\n")
```
